title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge personalized experiences with Contentful and AWS (AIM296)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Contentful 和 AWS 增强个性化体验 (AIM296)
abstract: Customers today expect personalized experiences at every touchpoint, and become frustrated by generic, AI‑authored content. But personalization at scale is challenging when you're targeting diverse audiences across multiple channels, all while staying on brand. Contentful and AWS make it simple (and fast). Running natively on AWS and powered by Amazon Bedrock, Contentful’s AI-native platform delivers content at scale, handling the data demands that personalized experiences require. In this lightning talk, you'll learn why customers choose Contentful to power their digital experiences: powerful, context‑aware personalization backed by a scalable approach to content operations. The result? A clear experience that makes each user feel like your brand’s most important customer. This presentation is brought to you by Contentful, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 当今客户期望在每个接触点都能获得个性化体验，并对通用的AI生成内容感到沮丧。但是，当您面向跨多个渠道的多样化受众时，大规模个性化具有挑战性，同时还要保持品牌一致性。Contentful和AWS让这变得简单（且快速）。Contentful的AI原生平台在AWS上原生运行，由Amazon Bedrock提供支持，可大规模交付内容，处理个性化体验所需的数据需求。在这个闪电演讲中，您将了解客户选择Contentful来支持其数字体验的原因：强大的、上下文感知的个性化，由可扩展的内容运营方法支持。结果如何？清晰的体验让每个用户都感觉自己是您品牌最重要的客户。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Contentful为您呈现。
